items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals higher open for Sensex, Nifty; Asian markets gain
items.description: Stock Market Today: GIFT Nifty futures, trading around 60 points ahead, indicated markets in India were likely to start on a positive note on Monday.

items.title: Bond bulls bet on RBI's dovish turn to extend rally amid policy shift
items.description: While interest-rate swaps are pricing a rate cut only in December, traders are girding for a possible shift in the RBI's stance to neutral

items.title: FTSE Russell Index revamp has S Korean, Indian bond markets on watch
items.description: FTSE Russell will on Oct. 8 announce any inclusions into benchmarks including its World Government Bond Index, which tracks $29 trillion of global fixed income

items.title: Technical indicators show strong support for Nifty: Is it time to buy dips?
items.description: The Nifty 50 Index is experiencing a downward trend in the near term. However, the index is approaching a strong support zone at 24,800

items.title: Share Market Today: RBI MPC meet, Q2 earnings, Middle East war, Oil, FIIs
items.description: At 6:40 AM, GIFT Nifty futures were trading 89 points higher at 25,262 levels, suggesting a robust opening for the markets.

items.title: These are top two stocks recommended by Rajesh Bhosale of Angel One
items.description: Since the March swing lows, prices of JK Paper saw a strong rally, doubling from Rs 320 to Rs 640. However, over the last couple of months, prices entered a correction phase

items.title: Stocks to Watch: HDFC Bank, Adani Wilmar, REC, Adani Total, Canara Bank
items.description: Stocks to Watch: Life Insurance Corporation of India has increased its shareholding in Bank of Maharashtra from 4.05 per cent to 7.10 per cent following the allotment of shares during a QIP.

items.title: SBI Card, SDBL, BoB; top stocks by Jigar S Patel of Anand Rathi for Oct 7
items.description: After peaking around 817, SBICARD saw a steep drop of nearly 78 points, marking a significant decline of around 10 per cent in its value

items.title: India's equity-market valuation premium over China narrows to 54.2%
items.description: Equity market trend attributed to faster growth in India Inc earnings

items.title: Check FIIs, DIIs, retail positions in F&O post Nifty biggest weekly fall
items.description: Derivatives market update for Oct 07: FIIs long-short ratio in index futures further falls to 1.4, down 300 bps in last 4 trading sessions; retail investors turn bullish after more than a month.

items.title: Jio Fin Services zooms 3% on partnership with Blackrock; check details here
items.description: Shares of Jio Financial Services (JFSL) surged up to 3.1 per cent at Rs 349.50 per share on the BSE in Monday's intraday deals

items.title: Indian bond yields seen inching up in trading as 10 year US yield nears 4%
items.description: The 10-year U.S. yield rose to its highest level in nearly two months following the data, and came within a touching distance of the critical 4 per cent mark

items.title: Brokerages bullish on Macrotech Developers; Q2 update boosts stock by 4%
items.description: Macrotech Developers achieved its best ever quarterly pre-sales of Rs 42.9 billion, marking a growth of 21% on Y-o-Y despite the inauspicious 'Shradhh' period falling in Sept this FY (vs Oct in FY24).

items.title: This jewellery share hits record high as board okays stock split, fundraise
items.description: Senco Gold shares rose today after its board, on Friday, approved a fundraising plan via QIP worth Rs 500 crore

items.title: Antony Waste Handling Cell shares fly 9% after large order win; know more
items.description: Mumbai based waste management company Antony Waste Handling Cell's shares jumped 8.99 per cent at Rs 761.85 per share on the NSE

items.title: Godrej Properties shares surge 3% on Q2 biz update; Nuvama upgrades to Buy
items.description: The upward movement followed the company's announcement that it achieved its highest-ever Q2 and H1 performance across several key operational parameters

items.title: HeidelbergCement zooms 18% on report Ambuja eyeing to buy co's India ops
items.description: Ambuja Cements is in talks to acquire Indian operation of Heidelberg at an estimated cost of Rs 10,000 crore for 14 mtpa, reports said

items.title: Why did Titan shares tumble 3% despite stellar Q2 business report?
items.description: Titan share price dropped despite the company reporting robust business performance for the September quarter (Q2FY25).

items.title: Will markets crash if BJP loses Haryana, J&K, Maharashtra, Delhi state polls?
items.description: The outcome of the state polls, especially in Haryana and Maharashtra, analysts believe, are also important from 'farm politics' viewpoint, and how the government deal with the farmer's demands

items.title: AU Small Finance climbs 3% after releasing Q2 update; check out details
items.description: AU Small Finance's total deposit for the quarter ended September 30 is likely to grow 12.7 per cent to Rs 1,09,690 crore

items.title: Coforge gains 2%, hits record high on Rs 19 per share interim dividend
items.description: The company has fixed October 11, as the record date to ascertain the eligibility of shareholders for the payment of the second interim dividend.

items.title: Paytm plummets 5% after CTO's resignation; Deependra Singh to take over
items.description: Shares of One 97 Communications, parent of fintech major Paytm dropped as much as 4.69 per cent a piece on the NSE in Monday's intraday trade

items.title: Lupin share down 3% as USFDA issues 5 observations for Biotech unit in Pune
items.description: Lupin share price slipped in trade after the company announced that United States Food and Drug Administration (USFDA) has issued five observations for its Pune-based Biotech facility.

items.title: Garuda Construction IPO: 23% GMP, Rs 1,400-cr order book; should you bid?
items.description: The public issue comprises a fresh issue of 18,300,000 shares and an offer for sale of 9,500,000 shares with a face value of Rs 5 each

items.title: SmallCap index down 3%; IIFL Securities, Geojit freeze in 10% lower circuit
items.description: PC Jeweller, MTNL, Kitex Garments, 63 Moons Tech, Genus Power, Refex Industries, Solara Active Pharma, and Suraj Estates Developers were locked in 5 per cent lower circuit on the BSE.

items.title: Pivot points to track on these 5 private, PSU banks ahead of RBI policy
items.description: SBI, Bank of India, ICICI Bank, HDFC Bank and PSB are seen trading at their respective make-or-break points post the recent stock market fall. Here are the key levels to watch out for.

items.title: Bandhan Bank share price rises 3% after Q2 total deposits jump 27% YoY
items.description: The uptick in Bandhan Bank share price came after the company announced a strong set of business updates in the September quarter of financial year 2025 (Q2FY25).

items.title: Pivot points to track on 5 private, PSU bank stocks ahead of RBI policy
items.description: SBI, Bank of India, ICICI Bank, HDFC Bank and PSB are seen trading at their respective make-or-break points post the recent stock market fall. Here are the key levels to watch out for.
